title: How to Download Microsoft Picture Manager

steps.title: Open the SharePoint Designer 2007 page.
steps.content: Open the SharePoint Designer 2007 page. This is the page from which you'll download SharePoint 2007, which is the program you'll use to install Picture Manager.

steps.title: Scroll down and select a language.
steps.content: Scroll down and select a language. Click the "Select Language" drop-down box, then click the language you want to use for your installer.

steps.title: Click Download.
steps.content: Click Download . It's an orange button to the right of the "Select Language" field.

steps.title: Check the "SharePointDesigner.exe" box.
steps.content: Check the "SharePointDesigner.exe" box. You'll find this option on the left side of the page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next . It's in the lower-right side of the page. Doing so prompts SharePoint 2007's setup file to begin downloading, though you may need to select a save location and/or confirm the download before you can proceed.

steps.title: Double-click the "SharePointDesigner" setup file.
steps.content: Double-click the "SharePointDesigner" setup file. Unless you selected a different download location, you'll find this in your browser's default "Downloads" folder.

steps.title: Click Yes when prompted.
steps.content: Click Yes when prompted. This will open the installation window.

steps.title: Check the "I accept the terms of this agreement" box.
steps.content: Check the "I accept the terms of this agreement" box. It's in the bottom-left corner of the window.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . This option is in the bottom-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Click Customize.
steps.content: Click Customize . It's in the middle of the window.

steps.title: Expand the "Office Tools" heading.
steps.content: Expand the "Office Tools" heading. Click the + icon to the left of the "Office Tools" heading to do so. You should see a list of items appear below the "Office Tools" heading.

steps.title: Scroll down to the "Microsoft Office Picture Manager" heading.
steps.content: Scroll down to the "Microsoft Office Picture Manager" heading. You'll find it in the list of items below the "Office Tools" heading.

steps.title: Click the "Menu" icon.
steps.content: Click the "Menu" icon. It's to the left of the "Microsoft Office Picture Manager" heading. Doing so prompts a drop-down menu .

steps.title: Click Run from My Computer.
steps.content: Click Run from My Computer . This option is in the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Install Now.
steps.content: Click Install Now . It's at the bottom of the window. SharePoint 2007 and the included Microsoft Picture Manager program will begin installing.

steps.title: Wait for the installation to complete.
steps.content: Wait for the installation to complete. This will take around 15 minutes. Once you're prompted to click Close , you can do so to proceed.

steps.title: Open Microsoft Picture Manager.
steps.content: Open Microsoft Picture Manager. Once you've finished installing Picture Manager, you can open it by clicking Start , typing in microsoft office picture manager , and clicking Microsoft Office Picture Manager at the top of the Start menu. If you don't see Picture Manager in the Start menu, restart your computer by clicking Power and then clicking Restart . Once your computer finishes restarting, Picture Manager will appear in Start.
